author: toby
title: Project-viewer for Catalyst
description: As of now, there is no transparent, public, and easy accessible way to record and categorize Catalyst projects. Catalyst has no overview.
solution:
https://www.cardanoworld.io/projects in its updated version will provide catalyst-search-filters, e.g.:

category
fund round
experience:
We have developed https://www.cardanoworld.io, https://www.cardanoworld.io/projects and run the stake pool CASCH.
See PHASE 1.
